name: Every Trick in the Book
description:
Controls
 WASD — move E — interact SPACE — dash

Every Trick in the Book is a tricky action game taking place in the Library of Unseen University.

Deadliest tomes and manuscripts of unknown power broke free from the shelves. As a Librarian, you cannot let them hover around off leash! Master the chaos and put the magic books to their rightful place – whether they consent or not.

In memory of Sir Terence David John Pratchett.

Features:

Think fast, move faster.
Those folios are ready to fight for their freedom, and each of them has a trick up its sleeve.

Welcome to Unseen University.
Here's your chance to have a sneak peek inside Discworld and see how you do in it.

Silence in the Library.
Take those unpredictable books under control and bring peace and order back.
